en.title: Oil & Gas Services and Equipment Census: 2023
en.description: Census of all registered establishments engaged in OGSE activities, covering key statistics on inputs, outputs and employment.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released data from the inaugural Oil & Gas Services and Equipment Census of all registered establishments engaged in OGSE activities, covering key statistics on inputs, outputs and employment.

resources.resource_name: Oil & Gas Services and Equipment Census: 2023
Oil & Gas Services and Equipment Census: 2023

bm.title: Banci Perkhidmatan dan Peralatan Minyak & Gas
bm.description: Banci bagi semua pertubuhan berdaftar yang terlibat dalam aktiviti OGSE, merangkumi statistik penting input, pengeluaran, dan guna tenaga.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan data dari Banci Perkhidmatan dan Peralatan Minyak & Gas (OSGE) buat pertama kali, merangkumi statistik penting input, pengeluaran, dan guna tenaga bagi semua pertubuhan berdaftar yang terlibat dalam aktiviti OGSE.
